articles.author: Tom Farren
articles.description: The creators of Ethereum NFT project DeGods and the Polygon-based y00ts are teasing big moves, including expanded IP rights for holders.
articles.title: DeGods Tease Next Moves With 'Early Facebook' Vibes Because 'Roadmaps Are Stupid'

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The Ethereum co-founder said he feels bad about how Solana is being treated by U.S. regulators.
articles.title: Ethereum Founder Vitalik Buterin Says He Feels 'Sorry' for Solana

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: Runway AI, the firm behind RunwayML 2 raised $141 million in what has been a pretty hot week for AI startups.
articles.title: AI Gold Rush: Runway Raises $141 Million for Its Text-to-Video Tech

articles.author: Ryan Gladwin
articles.description: This free-to-play multiplayer shooter recalls classics like Quake, albeit with NFTs and a play-to-earn twist. Here’s how to get started.
articles.title: Ev.io Beginner's Guide: How to Earn Solana in This NFT First-Person Shooter

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: French fashion house Dior announced a line of men's sneakers with "digital twins" on Ethereum and an NFC chip-based authentication system.
articles.title: Dior Is Latest Luxury Brand to Embrace Tokenized Fashion—But Won't Say 'NFT'

articles.author: Andrew Cohen
articles.description: Leading soccer club Manchester City is sticking with OKX, inking a three-year deal to make the crypto exchange its official sleeve sponsor.
articles.title: OKX Expands Manchester City Soccer Sponsorship With $70 Million Deal

articles.author: Ryan Gladwin
articles.description: From robot brothels to AI girlfriends, should sex robots require consent? Experts weigh in on this emerging moral dilemma.
articles.title: Do AI Sex Robots Require Consent Too?

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The newspaper reported Friday claims that the top regulator has said the applications "aren’t sufficiently clear and comprehensive" enough.
articles.title: SEC Calls BlackRock, Fidelity Bitcoin ETF Applications Inadequate: WSJ

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The amended Financial Services and Markets Bill enables the regulation of digital assets to support their safe adoption in the UK.
articles.title: New UK Law Recognizes Crypto Trading as Regulated Financial Activity

articles.author: Matt Hussey,Joseph O'Neill
articles.description: Bitcoin Cash was a hard fork of Bitcoin. The split took place in 2017 and since then, Bitcoin Cash has become one of the largest cryptocurrencies to emerge from Bitcoin. It has made a number of subtle but significant changes to distinguish itself from Bitcoin, namely larger block size and faster transaction times.
articles.title: What is Bitcoin Cash?

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi
articles.description: After its listing on EDX, the digital asset exchange backed by Wall Street giants Fidelity, Citadel and Charles Schwab, the trading activity around the token has surged significantly.
articles.title: Bitcoin Cash (BCH) Surges 33.9% in 24 Hours on EDX Listing, S. Korean Trading Spike

articles.author: Lucy Harley-McKeown
articles.description: The European food services and facilities management firm’s Pluxee division launches NFTs on Internet Computer, but they’re not for everyone
articles.title: Sodexo Drops NFTs With a Twist: They’re for Employees, Not the Public

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The world's leading derivatives exchange is set to expand its digital assets offering with a new product.
articles.title: CME Group to Launch Ethereum-to-Bitcoin Ratio Futures Next Month

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Typeface, which offers a generative content platform for businesses, raised $100 million to secure its AI “unicorn” valuation.
articles.title: Generative AI Startup Typeface Now Worth $1 Billion Thanks to Salesforce, Google

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Developers claim that their games were denied due to copyright concerns over AI-generated elements. Is a proper Steam ban on the horizon?
articles.title: Is Steam Rejecting PC Games Created With Generative AI?

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: Experts have conducted an external security audit and couldn’t find any significant flaws in the network built by Coinbase and Optimism.
articles.title: Coinbase's Ethereum Layer-2 Network Base Preps for Mainnet Launch

articles.description: HV-MTL Forge, the Bored Ape creator's latest game, blends Tamagotchi-style pet care with world building and social strategy. Here's how to play.
articles.title: Yuga's HV-MTL Forge Beginner's Guide: Do You Need Bored Ape NFTs to Play?

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Melania Trump starts the Independence Day celebrations early with $50 Solana collectibles, following the former president's NFT trading cards.
articles.title: Trump NFTs Are Back—This Time, It's $50 Melania July 4 Collectibles

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: The startup is now backed by Microsoft, Nvidia, and notable tech figureheads: Bill Gates, Eric Schmidt, and Reid Hoffman.
articles.title: AI Chatbot Startup Rockets to $4 Billion Valuation With Microsoft, Nvidia Backing

articles.author: Ryan Gladwin
articles.description: CS:GO accounts tied to at least $2 million worth of assets were just banned—but players could have more options with an NFT game.
articles.title: Steam Bans CS:GO Accounts With $2 Million Worth of Skins—Do NFTs Fix This?

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: After BlackRock's filing, the Boston-based investment giant is trying its luck with the SEC—again.
articles.title: Fidelity Refiles Bitcoin ETF Application With SEC as BlackRock Renews Hope

articles.description: The bill’s Republican sponsor described it as an important step toward “protecting” the state’s assets.
articles.title: North Carolina Reps Suggest Adding Bitcoin, Gold to State Treasury

articles.description: PREVIEW: In the simple but polished racing game, you can play as a Bored Ape or a Pudgy Penguin—no NFTs or crypto required.

articles.author: Pedro Solimano
articles.description: In their own words, the lawmakers say Canada has fallen behind the U.S. and Europe in its progress towards establishing crypto regulations.
articles.title: Canadian Lawmakers Want to Help Blockchain Businesses 'Flourish'

articles.description: Decrypt's Kate Irwin shares a first look at Delabs' upcoming lawn mower racing game Rumble Racing Star, which offers a large cast of quirky characters pulled from the worlds of Bored Ape Yacht Club, Pudgy Penguins, and more.
articles.title: Rumble Racing Star Game Preview: Is This Mario Kart With NFTs?

articles.author: Nicholas Morgan
articles.description: The company said Polygon 2.0 will better connect separate blockchains and do away with wrapped tokens.
articles.title: Polygon 2.0 Aims to Provide 'Unified Liquidity' Across Ethereum Scaling Networks

articles.author: Andrew Cohen
articles.description: The combined company will operate under the Candy banner, albeit with fewer employees amid layoffs this week.
articles.title: Candy Digital Confirms Layoffs, Reveals Merger With Palm NFT Studio

articles.description: Binance maintains it is “committed” to working with regulators amid reports of BaFin denying its application for a crypto custody license.
articles.title: Germany’s BaFin Rejects Binance Crypto Custody License: Report

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi
articles.description: The crypto exchange argued that the case falls outside the regulator's purview, as tokens are not investment contracts.
articles.title: Why Coinbase Thinks the SEC Lawsuit Should Be Dismissed

articles.author: Mattis Meichler
articles.description: Damus, a Bitcoin-friendly social media app, has won a reprieve in its battle to remain in the Apple App Store.
articles.title: Bitcoin-Friendly Damus Will Remain on Apple App Store—With ‘Core Feature’ Removed

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Binance's European banking partner Paysafe Payment Solutions will terminate support for the world’s largest crypto exchange in September.
articles.title: Binance Loses European Banking Partner Paysafe

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: The program, UNDW3, will reward engaged users with rarity-related NFT perks that the fashion brand says will increase those digital assets’ value.
articles.title: Lacoste Reveals Gamified, Tokenized Ecosystem for NFT Holders

articles.author: Robert Stevens,Ki Chong Tran,Daniel Roberts
articles.description: A Bitcoin ETF creates a simple, legally compliant way to trade the price of Bitcoin, accessible on markets that investors are already familiar with.
articles.title: What Is a Bitcoin ETF, and Why Does Everyone from Blackrock to Fidelity Want One?

articles.author: Pedro Solimano
articles.description: ARK added a surveillance-sharing agreement that appears to address potential market manipulation.
articles.title: Bitcoin ETF Race: Ark Amends SEC Filing to Match BlackRock

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: Algorithms are turning male suitors into virtual Casanovas—or at least they think so.
articles.title: Flirting With Algorithms: Men Are Harnessing AI to Win at the Dating Game

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Even before GPT-4's launch, a new study finds disinformation created with GPT-3 was harder to detect than human-made falsehoods.
articles.title: Humans Are More Likely to Believe Disinformation Generated By AI

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: The ConsenSys Founder says Gary Gensler may not be able to admit it, but that his hesitancy doesn’t matter.
articles.title: It’s A 'Forgone Conclusion' That Ethereum Is A Commodity, Says Joe Lubin

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Regulators appear to have said enough about these four digital assets to assuage Wall Street.
articles.title: Why Did Citadel-Backed EDX List Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, and Bitcoin Cash?

articles.author: Nicholas Morgan
articles.description: The TrueUSD team touts its high trading activity while holders fret over troubles at custodian Prime Trust.
articles.title: TUSD Brags About Volume 'Milestone' After Stablecoin Depegs

articles.description: Decrypt's Kate Irwin chats with Laguna Games about why the team chose to move away from an offer with WB Games to develop a Game of Thrones licensed title—and made Crypto Unicorns instead.
articles.title: Why Laguna Games Turned Down 'Game of Thrones' for Crypto Unicorns

articles.description: Mythical Games just raised a $37 million Series C1 round on the back of the early success of NFL Rivals, which has already topped a million downloads in two months. Mythical CEO John Linden joins Decrypt's Andrew Hayward to discuss the launch and impact of NFL Rivals.
articles.title: Mythical Games CEO John Linden on NFL Rivals Topping 1M Downloads

articles.description: At 3XP, Ava Labs Head of Gaming Ed Chang sat down with Decrypt's Kate Irwin to discuss some of the biggest Avalanche-based games on the horizon and how the company is approaching and thinking about Web3 gaming.
articles.title: How Ava Labs Is Approaching Gaming on Avalanche

articles.description: Ogimi founder David Gull speaks with Decrypt's Jason Nelson about its AI-driven meditation guides and how the technology can enable a more unique, custom-tailored meditation experience for users.
articles.title: Ogimi Founder David Gull on Why AI Should Be Your Meditation Coach

articles.description: Darren Glover, VP of Gaming at talent management agency VaynerSports, sat down with Decrypt's Kate Irwin at the 3XP expo to discuss the challenges faced by Web3-centric content creators, the current state of the esports market, and how decentralized streaming platforms can challenge centralized leaders like Twitch.
articles.title: VaynerSports Gaming VP Discusses Web3 Content Creators, Decentralized Streaming

articles.description: Rohit Gupta, co-founder of esports team NYXL, chats with Decrypt's Kate Irwin at the 3XP expo to discuss challenges faced by the esports industry and opportunities and experiments in Web3.
articles.title: NYXL Co-Founder on the State of Esports and Crypto Gaming

articles.description: Marc Mercuri, Head of Platform for Web3 shooter Shrapnel, speaks with Decrypt's Kate Irwin at the 3XP expo about GameBridge, a feature that simplifies blockchain item composability and interoperability.
articles.title: What Is GameBridge? Inside Shrapnel's Gaming Innovation

articles.description: Daniel Paez, Executive Producer on Immutable X-based card-battler Gods Unchained, discusses the long-running NFT game's launch on the Epic Games Store and the opportunity it provides.
articles.title: Gods Unchained Executive Producer Discusses Epic Games Store Move

articles.description: Words With Friends and Wildcard Creator Paul Bettner tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about his perspective on Axie Infinity and Web3 games.
articles.title: 'Play-to-Earn Is Not Dead. It Will Never Die' Says Words with Friends Creator Paul Bettner

articles.description: Cross the Ages is a digital collectible card game that challenges players to duel online opponents—and you can even mint your cards as tradable NFTs. It's complex and difficult to grasp at first, but this mobile-first game has some serious strategic upside. GG contributor Ryan Gladwin puts Cross the Ages through its paces.
articles.title: Cross the Ages Game Review: A Tough But Rewarding Card Battler

articles.description: In this interview, Decrypt's Jason Nelson chats with Alchemy product manager and AlchemyAI project lead Elan Halpern on blockchain analysis using ChatGPT, what AI means for better user experience, and the need to fact-check AI. Halpern also gives a demo of the new AlchemyAI ChatGPT plugin.
articles.title: "AI Is Game-Changing But Needs Fact-Checking": AlchemyAI Project Lead

articles.description: Justin Kan was a co-founder of Twitch and now works on Fractal, a Web3 gaming startup. Kan tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about his new company and what he's up to.
articles.title: Fractal Is Like an Arcade, Says Twitch Co-Founder Justin Kan

articles.description: Decrypt's Kate Irwin discusses the current regulatory climate in the U.S. with Gala Games' President of Blockchain Jason Brink.
articles.title: Are NFTs the Next SEC Target?

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: CCO and co-founder of Collab.Land Anjali Young explained at this year’s NFC Lisbon the origins of the crypto community tool kit, which industry niches are turning to its suite of products, and what’s next for the project since its token distribution event last February.
articles.title: Collab.Land Co-Founder Said There Was No ‘Aha Moment’ When Launching DAO Toolkit

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: With H.R. Giger's original "Alien" statue on full display at this year's NFC Lisbon, Particle CEO Harold Eytan told Decrypt that owning an NFT-ified slice of the piece isn't just for fans of the iconic creature and movie series but also for fine art collectors. Interested in owning a piece? Be prepared to cough up half an ETH for one of the 500 tranches of the digitized sculpture.
articles.title: Buying a Slice of H.R. Giger's 'Alien' Is Fine Art, Not Memorabilia: Particle CEO

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: The founder and CEO of metaverse fashion platform BNV Richard Hobbs said big brands are still nervous to let fans and community members customize their favorite garments. Still, he believes that as long as you can meet a firm's commercial bottom lines while stirring engagement, there's nothing to lose.
articles.title: Community Co-Creation 'Is a Big Step for Fashion Brands' Entering the Metaverse: BNV Founder and CEO

articles.description: Alok Vasudev is a co-founder of venture capital firm Standard Crypto. In an interview with Decrypt's Kate Irwin, he shares his thoughts on NFT marketing, NFT utility in gaming, and the stigma that pervades the industry.
articles.title: Standard Crypto VC Co-Founder on NFTs and Their Stigma in Gaming

articles.description: Ava Labs Head of Gaming Ed Chang shares news with Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the crypto firm's latest push to help traditional game developers break into blockchain gaming.
articles.title: Ava Labs Announces Avalanche Arcad3 for Game Developers at 3XP

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: At this year’s NFC Lisbon, multimedia artist and photographer YuLiang "YuYu" Liu broke down how themes from traditional painting and BDSM informed his latest NFT exhibition called “GAG.” He also shared exclusively with Decrypt a yet-to-be-launched drop for fans of his work.
articles.title: ‘Like a Middle Finger to Western Culture’: YuYu Unpacks Inspiration Behind NFT Expo GAG
